means: 适应于，适应不同情况（或环境）(to)
adaptive digital access protocol 自适应数字接入协议
abstract design and programming translator 抽象设计与程序设计翻译程序
analog-digital automatic program tester 模拟数字自动程序测试程序
Alcohol and Drug Abuse Prevention Team 酒精与毒品滥用预防工作组
automated data analysis using pattern recognition techniques 采用图形识别技术的自动化数据分析法

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"使适合，适应"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: adapt, adjust, conform, accommodate, suit, fit
means: adapt ：指人或物在原有情况下作某些改变以适应新的环境或不同的条件，强调改变的目的和重要性。
adjust与adapt含义很接近，但adjust所改变的幅度要小一些，侧重过程，主要用于调整角度、高度、光点等。
conform ：多指与某模式或规则相符，也引申指改变习惯等以适应新的环境。
accommodate ：书面用词，指以外部条件标准改变自己或某事以求得适应，着重改变或调节的有利。
suit ：指适合要求，从而使人满意愉快。
fit ：含义广，指人或物适合或适应某一目的或用途。

sentence.Network_en: The scriptwriter helped him to adapt his novel for the screen.
sentence.Network_cn: 编剧帮助他将其所著小说改编成电影。

sentence.Network_en: Buddhism had to adapt to the new world or perish.
sentence.Network_cn: 佛教必须适应新时代，否则将会消亡。

sentence.Network_en: Shelves were built to adapt the library for use as an office.
sentence.Network_cn: 为将图书馆改作办公室而做了一些架子。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 高一英语单词表 - 豆丁网 ... habitat n 生活环境；栖息地 △ adapt vt 使适应；改编 adapt to 适应（新环境等）.
雅思词汇表_百度文库 ... acrylic 丙烯酸的 adapt 使适应 addict 使沉溺.
英语构词法研究之一：A|英语单词构词法 ... accustom (使) 习惯于 adapt 使适应,使适合 adhere 坚持,黏著.
actual adj. 实在的，实际的，确实的adapt v. 修改，适应adjust v. 整理，使适应

list.abs: 形容人性格的词汇 ... able 有才干的，能干的； adaptable 适应性强的 active 主动的，活跃的；.
...视机(Tv)实现了二相插座的接口，现在我们定义一个适配器(Adapter)，这个适配器实现了三相插座的接口，所以它可以插在三相插座 …
英文面试常见问题 ... initiative 主动 adaptability 适应性 budget 预算.
一、适应(adaptation):当内外环境变动的时候，系统需要具备妥当的准备和相当的弹性，以适应新的变化来减轻紧张、磨擦的不良后果。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from French adapter, from Latin adaptare, from ad- 'to' + aptare (from aptus 'fit')

entry.def: If you adapt to a new situation or adapt yourself to it, you change your ideas or behaviour in order to deal with it successfully.

example.ex: The world will be different, and we will have to be prepared to adapt to the change...
example.tran: 世界会变得不同，我们必须做好准备以适应其变化。

example.ex: They have had to adapt themselves to a war economy.
example.tran: 他们不得不适应战时经济。

entry.tran: 使适合，使适应（新用途或新情况）
entry.def: If you adapt something, you change it to make it suitable for a new purpose or situation.

example.ex: Shelves were built to adapt the library for use as an office.
example.tran: 为将图书馆改作办公室而做了一些架子。

entry.def: If you adapt a book or play, you change it so that it can be made into a film or a television programme.

example.ex: The scriptwriter helped him to adapt his novel for the screen...
example.tran: 编剧帮助他将其所著小说改编成电影。

example.ex: The film has been adapted from a play of the same title.
example.tran: 电影改编自一部同名戏剧。

means.word_mean: 1. make fit for, or change to suit a new purpose;

sentences.sentence: "Adapt our native cuisine to the available food resources of the new country"

means.word_mean: 2. adapt or conform oneself to new or different conditions;

sentences.sentence: "We must adjust to the bad economic situation"

stems_affixes.word_buile: adapt适应+able能……的→adj.有适应能力的
apt适应,能力→adj.有倾向的,适当的
in无+apt能力→adj.不适当的;无能的
adapt[v.使适应,适应[环境]]+ation表名词→适应→适应[各种人]的书→改写本
apt适应,能力+itude性质,状态→有能力的状态
ad一再+apt适应,能力→一再适应[环境]

Sentence.sentence: Kodak's decision to file for bankruptcy（破产）protection is a sad, though not unexpected, turning point for a leading American corporation that pioneered consumer photography and dominated the film market for decades, but ultimately failed to adapt to the digital revolution.
Even the traditional chefs are aware of the need to adapt to local tastes and customs, while maintaining the Britishness of their cuisine.

Whether they experiment with three-year degrees, offer year-round classes, challenge the tenure system—or all of the above—universities are slowly realizing that to stay competitive and relevant they must adapt to a rapidly changing world.
Universities are increasingly aware that they must adapt to a rapidly changing world in order to stay competitive and relevant
Curriculums have been adapted to students' needs.

sentences.en: She knew how to adapt herself.
Many of Dickens' books have been adapted as films.
sentences.cn: 狄更斯的许多书都已改编成电影。

sentences.en: Many city vehicles have been adapted for use as school buses.
sentences.cn: 许多城市车辆已改为校车。

means.word_mean: 适应于，适应不同情况(或环境)(to)

sentences.en: She has not yet adapted to the climate.

jushi.english: Religious reformers attempted to adapt traditional religion.
jushi.chinese: 宗教改革者们试图改革传统的宗教。

jushi.english: She knew how to adapt herself.
